text:
As a part of my MPA internship, I am designing a community needs assessment for a town Recreation and Parks department with an alternate survey to be completed by youth. 
-Has anyone included children/youth in a (web-based) community needs assessment? 
-Can you explain your method of confirming parental consent? 
-Any thoughts on other considerations to take into account?
Much appreciated!
Edit: To clarify, I am familiar with the precautions that an educational researcher should take but would like to know what precautions a town department should be mindful of.
title: Community Needs Assessment - Surveying Youth
